item.title: Big Data with Python & Google BigQuery
item.description:
Description

Learn how to load, manipulate, and extract terabytes of data with Python and BigQuery, Google Cloud’s Big Data SQL database. We’ll cover some ways we’re using it at Vox Media, why you might use it over other stores, and some tricks for getting up to speed quickly.
item.dc:creator: Jeff Kramer

item.title: Python on the Brain: A Quick Dive into NuPIC
item.description:
Description

At OSCON 2013 Numenta's Jeff Hawkin presented NuPIC, an open source implementation of his theories on how the brain stores information, makes connections between entities, and predicts the future. In this talk we'll do a quick overview of the neocortical theory, and then dive into an interesting code example of how NuPIC works, and build a simple, fun neocortical prediction app in python.
item.dc:creator: Jeff Kramer

item.title: Hello PyBot - Python Chat Bots for Slack
item.description:
Description

Messaging based bots don't have to just be for twitter botmakers or chatops. Anyone with some python skills can build a bot to live in their slack rooms. In this talk we'll get you started: exploring the libraries you'll need, walking through a sample bot's code, and sharing some tips and tricks to make the next steps easier.
item.dc:creator: Jeff Kramer
